product.title: Samsung Smart Watch - 5th Generation
product.profit_item1: All proceeds from this product will go to a charity organization
product.profit_item2: Please contact store accounts to settle the payment
product.description_text: A brand new Samsung 5th generation smartwatch, water resistant up to 50m, high-resolution AMOLED display, battery lasts up to 7 days, with app support. The watch is perfect for sports and comes with a stylish quick-access strap.
